This good. This really good. The plot is great and the artwork is amazing. Too bad people are going to start complaining about NTR scenes that may or may not appear in the future. Complaining about NTR only makes you seem like some sort of vanilla extremist that wants to escape from the horrors of real life. Of course, I know this isn't the case with everyone, I acknowledge that most people inherently love vanilla and dislike NTR, but in many cases, complaining about it comes out "wrong" and becomes very annoying to see. As someone who as encountered many NTR doujins, I came to tolerate it. According to several comments around the site, I believe many people just outright blacklist the genre. I have no say in what you can like or dislike, but at least try and enjoy doujins for what they are. Please don't go around trashing works artists and authors have put time into just because their doujins may have a genre you may not like.
